animeTitle: Koukaku Kidoutai: Stand Alone Complex - Solid State Society 3D - Tachikoma na Hibi
animeDescription: Three new 3D Tachikomatic shorts released with the 3D version of Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex - Solid State Society on blu-ray and also in a BD-box with all the Tachikoma shorts.
